About Calandria Labour Consultants

Our core business is to supply and manage contracts for both temporary and permanent employees throughout South Africa. We spesialise in the employment and management of all types of artisans, packers, production employees, administrative office personnel, and all levels of industrial and construction industry employees. We believe in the utilisation and placement of premium staff to add value to future driven companies. All our employees are registered for Workmen's Compensation. We believe in dealing on an exclusive basis with both the clients and contractors to ensure long term mutual beneficial relationships based on trust and insight.

Advantages for the Employee

Multi-Skilling - The Employee becomes exposed to a variety of skills and industries.

Greater Job Security - Employees can be transferred when and if projects are completed.

Legal Protection - The Employee is secure in the knowledge that the Company complies with all statutory and legal requirements as prescribed by Law
